entry.summary: Arthur Hayes 博文：在这篇文章中，我将阐述为什么比特币将成为人工智能的货币选择。人工智能的潜在寿命比人类文明长得多。人工智能不应该信任任何需要人类操作的机构。比特币对任何人工智能来说都是合乎逻辑的货币选择。它是纯数字的、抗审查的、可证明的稀缺的，它的内在价值完全依赖于电力成本。

entry.summary:
香港区块链协会共同主席方宏进批评此前汪扬蔡文胜等文章，称发行港元稳定币是有意义的，只是不应该由香港政府发行，而是由私营机构在香港政府的监管下合规发行；用港币稳定币推动“去美元化”，鉴于港元和美元是联系汇率，且可以在香港自由互换，去美元化是不可能的。阅读全文：https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/nKRc4IsDsAGj0yKwVAlgBA https://twitter.com/wublockchain12/status/1676034454865989632

entry.title: Good illustration of why commodities like oil tend to be shitty investments over time
entry.summary:
Good illustration of why commodities like oil tend to be shitty investments over time
Corry Wang: It’s always fascinating to be reminded that Moore’s law applies to power consumption as much as it does to dollar cost From 2016 to 2020, Telefonica and Cogent’s datacenters tripled their served traffic, while energy consumption fell by -2% and -50% (!) respectively https://t.co/NSDVaCoROU

entry.title: Re @hufhaus9 Devil is in the details. If blackrock doesn’t own BTC. But their clients own via blackrock 51% of the network, then a hardfork would mak...
entry.summary:
Re @hufhaus9 Devil is in the details. If blackrock doesn’t own BTC. But their clients own via blackrock 51% of the network, then a hardfork would make blackrock owner and give them choice https://twitter.com/jratcliff/status/1669937251286126592?s=46&t=cM-600GJga7XNxddNsm-Pw
John W. Ratcliff: There is a strange point with the wording in that BlackRock ETF about hard forks. Traditionally, when a hard fork occurs, users get tokens on *both* forks. Large exchanges have generally honored this for custodial tokens. However, that's not what the BlackRock ETF says. It says… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1669937251286126592
